full_summary:
=================

### Request for Proposal for Sluice Handle Brakes

**Reference Number**: WS3786625728-Doc3788348307
**Solicitation Number**: WS3786625728
**Publishing Date**: December 13, 2022

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to submit offers for the fabrication, supply, and delivery of Sluice Handle Brakes and various spare parts for the Parks Canada Agency (PC) in Smiths Falls, Ontario.

**Scope of Work**

Canada is seeking proposals from qualified bidders to provide deliverables that meet the requirements outlined in the Annex Statement of Requirement. 

**Bid Submission Requirements**

All required supporting documentation and bids must be submitted electronically on January 10, 2023, by 14:00 EST. Bids submitted after 14:00 EST will be considered non-responsive.

**Important Changes to Tender Closing Date**

Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and the Canada Buys posting closing time. The new closing time for bid submissions is January 10, 2023, by 14:00 EST.

**Key Tender Information**

*   Tender Status: Expired
*   Expected Contract Start Date: January 16, 2023
*   Expected Contract End Date: N/A
*   Regions of Delivery: Smiths Falls

**Trade Agreements**

Canada has entered into the following trade agreements relevant to this tender: 
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Contact Information**: 
David Barltrop (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: david.barltrop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL**: 
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14886152
